title: Invalid Token Error issues (I would like help please)
body: The necessary verification is coming up for me,and I need help with it. When it sends the email,I receive it but here i the issue.I read the FAQ is your wondering.Even though it is the latest token,it will still be claased as invalid,which is annoying.I would like some help please,so if you would help,thank you.I want to keep my account.(Also why did my previous post (About this) not come when I done all the things required?).Anyway,I'd like some help please.I don't use voice chat thingy majigs.
